nodes.text: Domain Lacap was a Domain among the Yuuzhan Vong. During the Yuuzhan Vong invasion of the galaxy, Domain Lacap was granted stewardship of a whole star system by Supreme Overlord Shimrra. However, when Warmaster Nas Choka ordered them to Yuuzhan'tar to aid his armada in destroying Zonama Sekot, Domain Lacap refused to send a single ship.
